title: New: Billie Black – Going Under
content:
Fairly sure I remember this track being part of Billie Black’s set supporting Nao at Electrowerkz last year, and really vibing to it at the time.

Pretty different to anything she’s done before, and definitely starting to really carve out a niche for herself, it’s well worth a listen. The first track lifted from a new EP, out 25 Mayl check out Going Under below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
